Victor Ivan (‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂ö‡∑ä‡∂ß‡∂ª‡∑ä ‡∂Ö‡∂∫‡∑í‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä) is Sri Lankan journalist. He was a Marxist rebel in his youth and later became the Editor of the controversial Sinhalese newspaper Ravaya. He served as the Editor of the Ravaya for 25 years consecutively since its inception. Victor is an investigative journalist, political critic, a theorist, social activist and also an author of several books. 

He was the 7th accused of the main court case on the Youth Insurrection 1971. The panel of judges described him as the most colourful character of all suspects respondents.

Copyright by The life traveler (Gayan Lahiru)

comments.comment: Oona kenekuta puluwan may dennage atheethaya saha warthamanaya gena ovun kala    kee deya gena balala theendu therana ganna.Athenade Saith ohuge Avurudu 19ka kalaya thula Parliament ake endagena rata kabaseneya karpu Ranel nadaya samaga hema deyakatama atha ussala  bokkenma sahayogaya dunnu kenek.Athokota Sajithge peyaa karapu dewaluth janathawa dannawa hondatama.Athokota Gotabaya gena ohu kaladewal balance.Ohuge aiya Mahenda kala dewal genath balanna.Athokota puluwan obata newarade theeranayak ganna.May janadepathi waranaya janathawa senakeleyak bawata pathkaragena thiyenne.Anesa ape chandea nodunna keyala Parliament aka wahanne neha.Karunakara ewaseele wanthawa kenekuta awalada apawada nokeya obea buddemath theeranaya ganna.May katha karana mage mathayanam ara apawathvunu hamuduruwange deahaya thamunge pansal buumeye aadahanaya karanna nudunna akata oya Sajith kata kalaada.neha.Ethin monkathada thawath.Obalata Budu Saranai.

comments.comment: Mei chande aluth chanda laksha 10k thiyenewa. Giya paara chande wenas kale ei aluth chanda tika. Mei sare aluthin ma chanda walin 70% wage yanne gota ta. Anith kaarane saandaane chanda base eka. Ethana chanda aniwareyen laksha 10k-12k thiyenawa. 2015 di mahinda paalane minisunta epa wela thibilath mahinda thaniyema tharanga karala 47% gaththa. My3 gaththe 51%. Ekata hena set ekak ekathu wela thibba(UNP, TNA, jvp chandath dune my3 ta). Dan rate thiyena thathwe anuwa minisun wadipurama balanne arakshaawa. Pohuttuwa piti passe loku support ekak thiyenawa. Ei karunu baluwama gotabhaya aniwarayen dinanawa. Sajiya ta dinanna bari hethuwa unp anduwa nisai.

comments.comment:
During the President Premadasa's period this gentleman  and  Deshapriya were  attacking Mr Premadasa like nowadays  Ven Gnanasaara using their tabloids Raavaya and Yukthiya. Now Suddenly Victor  names Sajith as the leading candidate because of his empathy for the poor and the  oppressed?   Has he ever spoken or acted on behalf of the farmers when their fertiliser subsidy was taken out? Where was he when the poor  estate workers were agitating for their wage increase?
May be Sajith has a good following  among the lumpen proletariat and  small scale urban businessmen  in the Keselwatta area like his father once had. Victor you cant deceive the public any more with your armchair sermons because we were watching and following your comments on politics for the past 30 years.
comments.author: Vernon Galahitiyawa

comments.comment: Victor pivan. UNP aye aurudu 20katawath pathkaranne naha. Bomba karayo thamai unp ekata chande denne. Sajith hithanne api higanno kiyala ungen puka lewakaka higakanna. Rate arthikr hadapalla api salli hoyagannam. Umbalage katu kana ballo newei api.rate hamadetama  TAX. Import karan ewata sahana. Import nawathapan. Adun tikath bangladesh  walin import karanawa. Rate podiyata  mahan unta podi labayak thiyalawath wikunanna amarui.onama karana raw matirial.machine witharak Import karala ape rate hadana ewa import nawaththan loku tax ewata gahapan. Nathuwa manufacturers lata business karanna  bariwenna tax gahanna epa. UNP unta owa therenne naha. Mokada unp kiyanne import karan thammbinge pakshene. Math rawatila giyapara channde dunna aye denne naha.

Oyalagena igenaganna oyalagema kattiyage commenta kiyawanna ,hari lassana wachana kathakaranne ,ohoma katga kara kara api baudhdha kiyanna epa,aaka aagamatath honda ne.rata gena kathakaranna kalain thamange kata hadagena inna,athakota manussaya diunuwenawa athulin ratak diunuwenawa.oyata theruwan sarani.kathakaranna danne nethi minissu ekka mona kathada

Horakan karapu nokarapu ewa oyath dannwa mamath dannwa,,me manussaya horakan kara kiyanna puluwan deyak thiyanwada oyata,man me kathakaranne unp pakshaUya gena nemei,sajith premadhasa gena,eyage thaththata nindan gaththa kiyala chodana thiyenwa,hebei mekai mona nidanayak aran hari ahinsaka minissunta sethak karanne .anith eya nidan aran thamantai setha karagaththe.oita eha giya kisima chodanawak methumata ne

@sriyani loku galappaththi hari baudhdha aya,wachanayak kathakaranna danne ne,naayaka wagemai anugaamikayanuth.oyalawage maanasika leddunta kathakarala wedak ne,ow eka peththak horakan kara kiyanne anith ena okkoma horakan karanna epe neda,aaka thamai nuugath oyalawage ayage buddimattama,.mahaaaloku bauddayo neda karmaya karma palawadhaya andunanawada,manussayekta daruwek lebena nolebena heethun andunanawada,baudda ogollo namata baudda,ehema nounanam oya wage paudgalika kaarana opa mattam kara kara  charithayakata haani karanne ne,hebei mulim minuuntanam lamai innwa 8,10k ahema ayage daru senehasa honadata ethine rata dunnanam ethi.pahath uu tharaka geenna epa.

@Ruwini Mouli oita wada horakam karapu un  innawa unp  eka hora haththak rata jathiya kanna apu buddagamata rajya anugrahaya athiwama winasha karanna hadanne e wage pahara anduwak ponna samanala ralak inna mmahansi athi nowa unta barata kade gihin sajith kiyanneth wada ekek daruwek hada ganna bariwa rata hadanna enawa thopita thiyenne paksha meniywa wena mokuth newei lankawa loketa  me tharam naya kare mahindala wennathi dannathi huththak katha naokara hitapan mage yaka aussannathiwa  dutu gamunuge kaduwa newei maha bankuwata kelapu pal horu okun thawa mona kathda nidan thawa ehekuta haranna thibbe naha sajith u ewa haruwa thaththa indeddi dan saduwaryek wela mokuth waradi karala nathi baba wela

@sriyani loku galappaththi peenawane oyage wachane sanwarakamanam ,ane ow eyalata horakaran purudu karanna podi athadaruwone rajapakshala kiyanne,siripadhe gantare,dutugemunu rajathumge kaduwa ,awage aithihaasika urumayan eyala horakan kale,chaithya winasa kaleth eyala,den sinhala jathiyai agamai rekaganna kathakaranwa okkoma aithihasika dewal horakan kara kara,aphu awoth ruwanweli seeyath haarai.aakai baya

@Ruwini Mouli apoi oyage hadiyawa mahindalata horakam purudu kareth unp mahawali sanwardana yojana krameta deepu loka naya walin 40% wiyadam wela thibune ithuru tika sakkuwala ehema thamai lankawa loketa naya karanna patan gaththe ekek  newei hamoma horu anthimata maha bankuwatath keliya dan reddak kiyawana
@godakm lassnai send Dsagh ane eththamai godak coments dekkama eyalage aakalpa therunganna puluwan,wediyenma ehama aya thamai inne eyalata
@sriyani loku galappaththi ow rajapakshala nidan harapuwa balanna amapare chaithya balanna yanna ada hetama oya lankawenam inne
Apoi owu nidan hora apata nihathamanikama  wadak naha rate arakshawa wadagath  minimaruwekuge puthek ubata hoda athi  me  wada.balla apsta newei

replies.replyComment: Janadipathi keneku ge puthek unath ohu peeditha panthiya gana awabodayak thiyenawa. Mokada ohu sitiye colombo kuruduwatte nemei ne. Ohu niyojanaya kale samanaya mahajanaya

comments.comment: If that happens there is no change, same scenario will continue for another five years, what is the point and aren't we in a mess now?

replies.replyComment: @sriyani loku galappaththi mata lamai thunthennek (3) mattath Gota ge puthata wage maathiya nithahasa, prajathanthrvathaya, pawul palanakayak nathi lokaye jeewathwenna .... suthu van nathi lakaye jeewathwenna (Gotage putha wage)

Sajithta English puluwang oi!!!!!!! :;(

Aththa katha karanakota , pohottuwe un kata arinne kunuharupen maha unge nahadicha kama mungen penawa. Maha un hariyata hitiyanam wate inna un mehema wenne ne, muntada rata bara denne.

@Rohan Perera deshapalane gana dannawada. Ubalata kelawila thiyenne thope gon gathi nisa. Manussayakuta katha karanna danne nathi thirisannu. Ubala hada gahila thiyenneth loku harak widiyatamai. Thopi kade yana deshapaluwo ubalata thanakola kawana dawasa wadi athaka newei.
Onama ottuwak danawa 55% k ganna be

comments.comment: It is a great myth that Sajith is from down-trodden people. In fact, he lived a luxury life in England when he was young and later came to Sri Lanka and has been living even more luxurious life from then. Sri Lankan people are blind  and foolish to believe that he is from lower class.
comments.author: Priyantha Wijayatunga

replies.replyComment: It's because the poor people do not get glimpse of the luxury living and they fall for actors and what being said in party rallies. Even if they see hes living  luxuriously they are still happy for him.   What to do it's our countries general publics mentality.
Eyata hapan kenek me para aawoth un nisa apith iwarai.
